Docs.param: The root element.
Docs.summary:
Find all ascendant elements of the specified element. This method can be chained with LINQ calls to add additional filters or projections on top of the returned results.
This method is meant to provide extra flexibility in specific scenarios and it should not be used when only the first item is being looked for. In those cases, use one of the available overloads instead, which will offer a more compact syntax as well as better performance in those cases.
Docs.returns: All the descendant instance from .
